name: Click sound
description: Plays a sound whenever you press a jump button.

OnlyOnJump.name: Only play on jump
OnlyOnJump.description: Doesn't play sound on movement of platformer keys

enable-clicksound.name: Enable click sounds
enable-clicksound.description: Enable or disable click sounds without restarting the game!

clicksound-currentsound.name: Current click sound
clicksound-currentsound.description: Change the click sound. 0 = Custom, 1 = Default, 2 = Metronome, 3 = Click One, 4 = Click Two, 5 = Click Three, 6 = Fire In The Hole, 7 = I love GD Cologne, 8 = Vine Boom, 9 = Bwomp, 10 = Metal Pipe, 11 = TikTok, 12 = Plug.

custom-clicksound.name: Upload a custom click sound
custom-clicksound.description: Select a .ogg, .wav, or .mp3 format file to set as sound 0. The best practice is to use a .ogg format sound that start loudly and immediately.

custom-releasesound.name: Upload a custom release sound
custom-releasesound.description: Select a .ogg, .wav, or .mp3 format file to set as sound 0. The best practice is to use a .ogg format sound that start loudly and immediately.

releasesound-currentsound.name: Current release sound
releasesound-currentsound.description: Change the release sound. 0 = Custom, 1 = Default, 2 = Metronome, 3 = Click One, 4 = Click Two, 5 = Fire In The Hole, 6 = I love GD Cologne, 7 = Vine Boom, 8 = Bwomp, 9 = Metal Pipe, 10 = TikTok, 11 = Plug.
